Comments.Message:
hello Bmuzammil

Thank you for your request of the sample! 

Are you looking for a code sample that automatically load data when you scroll down to the page bottom?  Here are two existing All-In-One Code Framework samples that could probably answer your requirement:

http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/CSASPNETInfiniteLoading-16f5bdb8
http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/VBASPNETInfiniteLoading-10c3f379
